abstract: Lions Coach Jim Schwartz chased after Niners Coach Jim Harbaugh and shoved him after what he perceived to be an overexuberant celebration following the 49ers' victory.
snippet: Lions Coach Jim Schwartz chased after Niners Coach Jim Harbaugh and shoved him after what he perceived to be an overexuberant celebration following the 49ers' victory.

headline.main: Was Schwartz Justified in Being Upset With Harbaugh?
